scripts.build-assets: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.move-acemart-mac: npm run replace-res-acemart && echo '{"name":"acemart", "displayName":"acemart"}' > app.json && cp -a native/acemart/assets/img/. assets/img && cp -a native/acemart/theme/. src/theme && cp -a native/acemart/assets/img/. src/assets/img && npm run hygen-config-acemart
scripts.move-acemart-dev-mac: npm run replace-res-acemart && echo '{"name":"acemart", "displayName":"acemart"}' > app.json && cp -a native/acemart/assets/img/. assets/img && cp -a native/acemart/theme/. src/theme && cp -a native/acemart/assets/img/. src/assets/img && npm run hygen-config-acemart-dev
scripts.move-automaxima-mac: npm run replace-res-automaxima && echo '{"name":"automaxima", "displayName":"automaxima"}' > app.json && cp -a native/automaxima/assets/img/. assets/img && cp -a native/automaxima/theme/. src/theme && cp -a native/automaxima/assets/img/. src/assets/img && npm run hygen-config-automaxima
scripts.move-automaxima-dev-mac: npm run replace-res-automaxima && echo '{"name":"automaxima", "displayName":"automaxima"}' > app.json && cp -a native/automaxima/assets/img/. assets/img && cp -a native/automaxima/theme/. src/theme && cp -a native/automaxima/assets/img/. src/assets/img && npm run hygen-config-automaxima-dev
scripts.move-funtoast-mac: npm run replace-res-funtoast && echo '{"name":"funtoast", "displayName":"funtoast"}' > app.json && cp -a native/funtoast/assets/img/. assets/img && cp -a native/funtoast/theme/. src/theme && cp -a native/funtoast/assets/img/. src/assets/img && npm run hygen-config-funtoast
scripts.move-funtoast-dev-mac: npm run replace-res-funtoast && echo '{"name":"funtoast", "displayName":"funtoast"}' > app.json && cp -a native/funtoast/assets/img/. assets/img && cp -a native/funtoast/theme/. src/theme && cp -a native/funtoast/assets/img/. src/assets/img && npm run hygen-config-funtoast-dev
scripts.move-fareastflora-mac: npm run replace-res-fareastflora && echo '{"name":"fareastflora", "displayName":"fareastflora"}' > app.json && cp -a native/fareastflora/assets/img/. assets/img && cp -a native/fareastflora/theme/. src/theme && cp -a native/fareastflora/assets/img/. src/assets/img && npm run hygen-config-fareastflora
scripts.move-fareastflora-dev-mac: npm run replace-res-fareastflora && echo '{"name":"fareastflora", "displayName":"fareastflora"}' > app.json && cp -a native/fareastflora/assets/img/. assets/img && cp -a native/fareastflora/theme/. src/theme && cp -a native/fareastflora/assets/img/. src/assets/img && npm run hygen-config-fareastflora-dev
scripts.android-demo-acemart: npm run move-acemart-mac && npm run android-demo
scripts.android-dev-acemart: npm run move-acemart-dev-mac && npm run android-demo
scripts.android-demo-automaxima: npm run move-automaxima-mac && npm run android-demo
scripts.android-dev-automaxima: npm run move-automaxima-dev-mac && npm run android-demo
scripts.android-demo-funtoast: npm run move-funtoast-mac && npm run android-demo
scripts.android-dev-funtoast: npm run move-funtoast-dev-mac && npm run android-demo
scripts.android-demo-fareastflora: npm run move-fareastflora-mac && npm run android-demo
scripts.android-dev-fareastflora: npm run move-fareastflora-dev-mac && npm run android-demo
scripts.replace-res-acemart: cp -a native/acemart/android/app/src/main/res/. android/app/src/main/res && cp -a native/acemart/android/app/src/demo/res/. android/app/src/demo/res  && cp -a native/acemart/android/app/src/dev/res/. android/app/src/debug/res && cp -a native/acemart/android/app/src/dev/res/. android/app/src/dev/res
scripts.replace-res-automaxima: cp -a native/automaxima/android/app/src/main/res/. android/app/src/main/res && cp -a native/automaxima/android/app/src/demo/res/. android/app/src/demo/res  && cp -a native/automaxima/android/app/src/dev/res/. android/app/src/debug/res && cp -a native/automaxima/android/app/src/dev/res/. android/app/src/dev/res
scripts.replace-res-funtoast: cp -a native/funtoast/android/app/src/main/res/. android/app/src/main/res && cp -a native/funtoast/android/app/src/demo/res/. android/app/src/demo/res  && cp -a native/funtoast/android/app/src/dev/res/. android/app/src/debug/res && cp -a native/funtoast/android/app/src/dev/res/. android/app/src/dev/res
scripts.replace-res-fareastflora: cp -a native/fareastflora/android/app/src/main/res/. android/app/src/main/res && cp -a native/fareastflora/android/app/src/demo/res/. android/app/src/demo/res  && cp -a native/fareastflora/android/app/src/dev/res/. android/app/src/debug/res && cp -a native/fareastflora/android/app/src/dev/res/. android/app/src/dev/res
scripts.hygen-config-acemart: npx hygen config release --name acemart --color "0, 191, 202" --env demo --productLine 2 && npx hygen config demo --name acemart --color "0, 191, 202" && npx hygen config dev --name acemart --color "0, 191, 202"
scripts.hygen-config-acemart-dev: npx hygen config release --name acemart --color "0, 191, 202" --env dev --productLine 2 && npx hygen config demo --name acemart --color "0, 191, 202" && npx hygen config dev --name acemart --color "0, 191, 202"
scripts.hygen-config-automaxima: npx hygen config release --name automaxima --color "255, 173, 78" --env demo --productLine 3 && npx hygen config demo --name automaxima --color "255, 173, 78" && npx hygen config dev --name automaxima --color "255, 173, 78"
scripts.hygen-config-automaxima-dev: npx hygen config release --name automaxima --color "255, 173, 78" --env dev --productLine 3 && npx hygen config demo --name automaxima --color "255, 173, 78" && npx hygen config dev --name automaxima --color "255, 173, 78"
scripts.hygen-config-funtoast: npx hygen config release --name funtoast --color "207, 48, 48" --env demo --productLine 2 && npx hygen config demo --name funtoast --color "207, 48, 48" && npx hygen config dev --name funtoast --color "207, 48, 48"
scripts.hygen-config-funtoast-dev: npx hygen config release --name funtoast --color "207, 48, 48" --env dev --productLine 2 && npx hygen config demo --name funtoast --color "207, 48, 48" && npx hygen config dev --name funtoast --color "207, 48, 48"
scripts.hygen-config-fareastflora: npx hygen config release --name fareastflora --color "0, 63, 36" --env demo --productLine 2 && npx hygen config demo --name fareastflora --color "0, 63, 36" && npx hygen config dev --name fareastflora --color "0, 63, 36"
scripts.hygen-config-fareastflora-dev: npx hygen config release --name fareastflora --color "0, 63, 36" --env dev --productLine 2 && npx hygen config demo --name fareastflora --color "0, 63, 36" && npx hygen config dev --name fareastflora --color "0, 63, 36"
scripts.build-acemart: npm run move-acemart-mac && npm run android-demo-rel
scripts.build-automaxima: npm run move-automaxima-mac && npm run android-demo-rel
scripts.build-funtoast: npm run move-funtoast-mac && npm run android-demo-rel
scripts.build-fareastflora: npm run move-fareastflora-mac && npm run android-demo-rel

android.emu.debug.build: cd android && gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..
android.emu.debug.name: Nexus_5X_API_29_x86
